title: TPACK-Based Instructional Design for Teaching Redox Reaction Concepts Using Digital Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic chemistry concepts (ions, atomic structure) and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Professionals in medical/legal/technical fields lacking foundational chemistry knowledge but requiring understanding of field-applicable concepts

learning_goals: Learners can visually and numerically explain electron transfer processes in redox reactions via fruit-based electrochemical demonstrations
Using digital sensors (current/pH), learners perform multilevel analysis linking macroscopic phenomena, microscopic particle behavior, and symbolic representations
Using LMS collaboration tools, learners accurately derive redox reaction equations through peer concept modeling
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
